item.description:
Join us at Whaleback Mountain to celebrate their First Friday event! Listen to LIVE MUSIC in the pub and get FREE equipment demo's by Omer and Bob's!

No cost to attend! Just $10 For a lift ticket for night skiing and riding.

- Rental equipment is also only $10 for this First Friday event.

IF YOU ARE INTERESTED IN MEETING OTHER SINGLES:
- Purchase your lift ticket for only $10 the night of the event at the ticket counter and then please come up stairs to the Mix & Mingle registration desk for your welcome information.

- Even if you don't ski or ride, this is sure to be a great evening of mingling and live entertainment, so please RSVP! (There is no cost to come and listen to the music)

- This event will take place even if the snow conditions are not ideal.

- Hungry? No problem, the pub serves food, soda and an assortment of cold beverages.

Join the Mix & Mingle in Upper Valley singles group to learn more about upcoming singles events. Please contact me with any questions.

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Ski & Ride at Whaleback!
